name: Every 10 seconds life
description:
Download (EN/UA)

Every 10 Seconds Life

Look on every important second in the life of the characters. Play mini games. Clean up after the cat, get married, get a job, etc.
Find a piece of your life in the 10 seconds!

Move to hint and press [E]

This game was made in Jam Ludum Dare 51
